text: Henryk Średnicki (17 January 1955 - 10 April 2016) was a Polish amateur boxer. He represented his native country twice at the Summer Olympics, starting in 1976 (Montreal, Canada). Średnicki was best known for winning the world title at the second World Amateur Boxing Championships in 1978, beating Cuba's Héctor Ramírez in the final. ==References== ==Other websites== * sports- reference Category:1955 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Polish boxers
title: Henryk Średnicki
